name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2009
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2009年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Primary aluminum ingots produced by the casting process are suitable for use in various industries that require high-quality aluminum materials. This includes the automotive industry for manufacturing lightweight vehicle components, the construction industry for structural elements and panels, aerospace industry for aircraft components, and the electronics industry for conductors and casings.
通过铸造过程生产的原生铝锭适用于需要高质量铝材料的各种工业，包括用于生产轻质汽车组件的汽车工业、用于结构元件和面板的建筑业、用于飞机部件的航空工业、以及用于导体和外壳的电子行业。

technology.technologicalApplicability: Primary aluminum ingots produced by the casting process are suitable for use in various industries that require high-quality aluminum materials. This includes the automotive industry for manufacturing lightweight vehicle components, the construction industry for structural elements and panels, aerospace industry for aircraft components, and the electronics industry for conductors and casings.
通过铸造过程生产的原生铝锭适用于需要高质量铝材料的各种工业，包括用于生产轻质汽车组件的汽车工业、用于结构元件和面板的建筑业、用于飞机部件的航空工业、以及用于导体和外壳的电子行业。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCA data should ensure that they consider the specific year of data publication, which is 2009, as the environmental impact of aluminum ingot production may change over time with technological advancements. It is important to refer to the most recent data where possible. Additionally, users need to pay attention to the sources of both primary aluminum (PA) and secondary aluminum (SA) data. Recycling processes and their efficiencies should be considered when applying this data. Background data from the CAS RCEES 2018 should be used within the context of China, as they are specifically tailored to factor in local environmental impacts from energy, materials, transportation, and waste management.

使用这份LCA数据的用户应确保他们考虑到数据发布的具体年份，即2009年，因为铝锭生产的环境影响可能随着技术进步而随时间改变。在可能的情况下，应该参考最新的数据。此外，用户需要注意原生铝（PA）和再生铝（SA）数据的来源。在应用这些数据时，应考虑回收过程及其效率。CAS RCEES 2018的背景数据应在中国的背景下使用，因为它们是专门为考虑当地从能源、材料、交通和废物管理产生的环境影响量身定制的。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
